basestation.vision

Class VisionSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • basestation.vision.VisionSystem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CanonicalVisionSystem, OverheadVisionSystem, TangoVisionSystem

    public abstract class VisionSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a source of input for vision. Objects are tracked with VisionObjects which hold a VisionCoordinate. Each VisionObject must be represented by a persistent and uniquely identifiable integer which is VisionId, though VisionObjects are permitted to be changed at will as long as the integer ID is preserved for the same object.
